title.rendered: Saratoga Springs High School Recognized for Excellence in Sportsmanship, Ethics, and Integrity

content.rendered:
We are proud to share that Saratoga Springs High School has received the prestigious Award of Excellence from the National Federation of State High School Associations (NFHS) and the New York State Public High School Athletic Association (NYSPHSAA). This recognition honors our commitment to upholding the highest standards of sportsmanship, ethics, and integrity in interscholastic athletics.

Congratulations to all of our dedicated coaches and outstanding student-athletes who consistently represent our school and community with pride, respect, and character—both on and off the field. Your efforts embody the true spirit of competition and the values that define our athletic program.
